briefTitle: The Added Value of a Third Supervised Training Session to a Standard 12-week Rehabilitation Program After Breast Cancer: Pilot Study
officialTitle: The Added Value of a Third Supervised Training Session (Ground Exercises or Hydrotherapy) to a Standard 12-week Rehabilitation Program After Breast Cancer: Pilot Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* men and women after surgery for breast cancer (mastectomy/breast-conserving and/or axillary gland resection/sentinel biopsy)
* possible (neo)adjuvant chemotherapy and radiotherapy have been completed
* hormone and/or immunotherapy may still be ongoing

Exclusion Criteria:

* comorbidities that make hydrotherapy impossible, i.e. open wounds or allergy to chlorine
* oncological unstable disease
* terminal patients
* severe physical disabilities
* severe mental disabilities
* pregnancy
